plot outline: Seth Dinanath comes to a mansion which he has purchased recently and he sees that only person in the house is servant Sadoba.Dinanath notices a room which has been locked for long he surprised by visit of Vidya whose the wife of previous owner who decides to come an live there.She tells about her past how her husband a wealthy Thakur got attracted to towards Gajrabai and later was in debts with Dharamdas and she tried to save their mansion from him by mortgaging her jewelry.Sunil her son found about this and requested Dharamdas for help but he turned it down in turn a stranger whose life Sunil saved helped him to save his house and also offered to work with him.But Sunil was not aware that he was made scapegoat into all this.
title: Paradh
plot: A wealthy man purchases an old mansion but is perplexed to find a mysterious locked room.

Seth Dinanath comes to a mansion which he has purchased recently and he sees that only person in the house is servant Sadoba.Dinanath notices a room which has been locked for long he surprised by visit of Vidya whose the wife of previous owner who decides to come an live there.She tells about her past how her husband a wealthy Thakur got attracted to towards Gajrabai and later was in debts with Dharamdas and she tried to save their mansion from him by mortgaging her jewelry.Sunil her son found about this and requested Dharamdas for help but he turned it down in turn a stranger whose life Sunil saved helped him to save his house and also offered to work with him.But Sunil was not aware that he was made scapegoat into all this.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
